title: About Me
text: My name is Ivan and I am a biotechnology professional, MS/MBA in Biotechnology graduate student at The Johns Hopkins University, and sometime musician. By training I am a molecular biologist; professionally, I’ve worked as an assay developer, data scientist, and polymer chemist. Currently I live in Chicago, Illinois, with my corgi, Star.  Please visit LinkedIn for more information about my professional experience or the Projects page to see work I’ve done.
